original_text: These are the records of the tabernacle, the tabernacle of the testimony, as they were recorded at the commandment of Moses, the responsibility of the Levites under the direction of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
korean_text: 성막 곧 증거막을 위하여 레위 사람이 쓴 재료의 물목은 제사장 아론의 아들 이다말이 모세의 명령대로 계산하였으며

sentences.original_text: These are the records of the tabernacle
as they were recorded at the commandment of Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 모세의 명령에 따라 기록된 바와 같이

sentences.original_text: the son of Aaron the priest
